sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Farmer Equity Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Farmer Equity Act.

sections.heading: Legislative findings. This State recognizes the importance of investing in the long-term prosperity of our food and farming system, beginning with farmers
sections.text: It is the intent of the General Assembly that the Director of Agriculture should support socially disadvantaged farmers and include this suppor

sections.heading: Report. On or before January 1, 2020, the Department shall submit a report to the Governor and the General Assembly on efforts to serve socially disadvantaged farmers and female farmers in this State
sections.text: The report shall include recommendations to the Governor and the General Assembly on how to improve

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
